architectural_notes: App is deployed using hash-based routing (URLs require #/ to reach client-side routes).
known_issues: User reports that the app page now loads, but they cannot log in or get started (login flow not functioning).

existing_features.title: Fix Internet Identity login so the Login button reliably opens the Internet Identity provider in production and returns an authenticated identity to the app.

Update the "Get Started" / "Start Trading" onboarding behavior so unauthenticated users are prompted to log in first instead of being navigated to an authenticated-only route that immediately redirects back to the landing page.
Improve unauthenticated gating UX on authenticated pages (Trading, Wallet, Admin) so users see a clear call-to-action instead of a blank screen while being redirected or blocked.
Make login and onboarding errors observable: surface Internet Identity login errors and profile creation errors to the user in the UI, and provide a simple recovery action (e.g., retry login).

projectName: Fix login and onboarding flow so users can log in and get started
